mapper.select: SELECT p.*, pc.name as category_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pt.id ORDER BY pt.id SEPARATOR ',') as tag_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pt.name ORDER BY pt.id SEPARATOR ',') as tag_names, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ph.url ORDER BY ph.id SEPARATOR ',') as photo_urls FROM pets p LEFT JOIN pet_categories pc ON p.category_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN pet_tag_mappings ptm ON p.id = ptm.pet_id LEFT JOIN pet_tags pt ON ptm.tag_id = pt.id LEFT JOIN pet_photos ph ON p.id = ph.pet_id WHERE p.status = #{status} GROUP BY p.id

SELECT p.*, pc.name as category_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pt.id ORDER BY pt.id SEPARATOR ',') as tag_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pt.name ORDER BY pt.id SEPARATOR ',') as tag_names, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ph.url ORDER BY ph.id SEPARATOR ',') as photo_urls FROM pets p LEFT JOIN pet_categories pc ON p.category_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN pet_tag_mappings ptm ON p.id = ptm.pet_id LEFT JOIN pet_tags pt ON ptm.tag_id = pt.id LEFT JOIN pet_photos ph ON p.id = ph.pet_id WHERE p.id = #{petId} GROUP BY p.id
